meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is arranged on top of the head.
meanings.sent1: She wore an elegant updo to the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The bride's updo was beautifully done for her special day.
meanings.sent3: The updo stayed perfectly in place even during the dance.
meanings.sent4: Her updo was like a crown atop her head.
meanings.sent5: The updo added a touch of sophistication to her look.

meanings.definition: To style one's hair in an updo for a formal event.
meanings.sent1: She decided to updo her hair for the prom.
meanings.sent2: Many celebrities updo their hair for award shows.
meanings.sent3: He tried to updo his hair, but it ended up looking messy.
meanings.sent4: She updoed her hair like a professional stylist.
meanings.sent5: Updoing her hair made her feel glamorous and elegant.
